### move_columns

>  move_columns (df:pandas.core.frame.DataFrame, cols_to_move:str, pos:int)

*Move one or more columns to a specified position in a DataFrame.*

``` python
df = pd.DataFrame({'A': [1, 2, 3], 'B': [4, 5, 6], 'C': [7, 8, 9]})
df
```

``` python
move_columns(df, 'C', 0)
```
